Name: The Binding of YOU
About the game: The poor mans Binding of Isaac. Get it for 60 cents at launch or 1USD! The Binding of You is an indie rouge like arcade 4 directional shooter. Warning: The game is brutally hard to complete. There are a total of 10 Weapons, 10 abilities and 5 bonus Items that change and are random each time you play. The game uses a lootbox system for the weapons, so going for a better weapon is always a gamble. Do you stay with what you have? or risk what you have to get that rare or legendary? Fight through over 20 levels with 3 Zones each with its ending Boss. Save yourself from the demons within YOU. Show whose boss and compete with others with an Online highscore system This is the second launch of ''The Binding of YOU'' - There are no changes.
